mapper.update:
update V_STOCK_DATA
YEAR_MONTH_DAY = #{yearMonthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`YEAR_MONTH` = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADER_NAME = #{traderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADER_ID = #{traderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ASS_ORDER_NO = #{assOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COST_PRICE = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEW_COST_PRICE = #{newCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEW_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{newTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ONE_FL = #{oneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TWO_FL = #{twoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THREE_FL = #{threeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_ONE_FL = #{oldOneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_TWO_FL = #{oldTwoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_THREE_FL = #{oldThreeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where IN_STOCK_ID = #{inStockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update V_STOCK_DATA set YEAR_MONTH_DAY = #{yearMonthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `YEAR_MONTH` = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADER_NAME = #{traderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADER_ID = #{traderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ASS_ORDER_NO = #{assOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COST_PRICE = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEW_COST_PRICE = #{newCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEW_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{newTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ONE_FL = #{oneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TWO_FL = #{twoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THREE_FL = #{threeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_ONE_FL = #{oldOneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_TWO_FL = #{oldTwoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_THREE_FL = #{oldThreeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IN_STOCK_ID = #{inStockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM V_STOCK_DATA A WHERE A.`YEAR_MONTH` = #{dateStr}
